website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality mask that feels like a spa treatment but without the spa bill.
pros: Mask releases a soothing lavender scent
In addition to headache and sinus relief, mask has a steam feature to help with dry eyes
The fabric is soft and not too thick
Head strap is adjustable to fit most heads
cons: Lavender can not be swapped for another scent

customer_reviews.title: I have really enjoyed this Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this Eye Mask. I almost didn't get it because I'm allergic to perfumes and most other scents, and this said it was scented. But it is so mild it does not bother me. ..which is a miracle. What it does do is make my dry and often tired eyes feel much better. And Bonus-it forces me to sit back and relax for a few minutes, I spray it with warm water , turn heat to 5, and lay back for 10 top 20 minutes... Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DMR.

customer_reviews.title: What I didnt/don’t like is the lack of padding directly over the eye
customer_reviews.text: Initially I wasn’t sold on this item, but have changed my mind and loving it. The presentation was beyond what I was expecting. Boxed well, hot pink case and black mask. Material a plus. What I didnt/don’t like is the lack of padding directly over the eye. It doesn’t make contact with the eyelid, but the convenience of electricity for the 5 temperature settings and time in 10 minute increments with auto shut off when time is up. I’m sold, would recommend and would buy for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bismark Palm

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling heating pad for eyes - plus
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of applying heat to my eyes as my ophthalmologist suggested. It is so easy to keep the heat at a constant warmth with usb steam eye mask. Prior to receiving this product, I would have to microwave my eye mask. I also use this on my ears, neck and my shoulder. The heat gives relief to these areas without having to try to position and hold a regular size heating pad. I hope the operation of the Aroma Season eye mask last a long time. I’ve only had it 4 days. So far excellent and it smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Love the product?
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has a timer and cuts off after 30 min in case I fall asleep with it on. And I like that you can set the heat level. It gets perfectly hot and I think I smell a lavender sent which is relaxing. I have dry eye so this is much better than having to microwave an eye pad that only last 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: T. lee Cross

customer_reviews.title: Works very well! Used it 10+ times so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this for when I get styes instead of microwaving rice or a wet cloth. It works very well but I didn't want to wash the outer layer after every use to avoid contamination so what I did instead was take off the black outer layer, then wrap the heat pad with a napkin. It's the perfect amount of heat and when I'm done I can just discard the napkin.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient consistent heat for my dry eyes . Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect warm compress for my dry tired eyes.i ordered the satin eye mask and it's pretty and feels soft against my face. I love that you can set it for the amount of time (10-60min) and heat settings (1-5) and it shuts I ff automatically so if you fall asleep because you it's so relaxing it won't be an issue. I think it's more convenient that reheating a wet rag or the thermalon eyemasks every couple of minutes when it cools.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't get close to warm. I had it on the hottest setting and it was luke warm at best. I sent it back the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 months, but now is overheating
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic dry eye and recurrent corneal erosion. I bought this mask to provide a moist heat, which helps ease my symptoms at night. It was great! Super easy to use, and actually worked. I was quite a fan. But here we are two month later and I’m getting ready to trash it. Even on the lowest setting, it gets too hot (enough that I am concerned about burns) and last night it smelled of burning. I’m disappointed because I really liked it and it helped my condition a lot, but I can’t give a better review when I’m concerned about it catching on fire and burning my house down
customer_reviews.author: mrandmrskats

customer_reviews.title: nice to have continuous heat...
customer_reviews.text: so many heat packs for eyes, don’t have the heft to lay on top of your lids... and if they do, they only last 10 or 15 minutes... but this extends the heat of those types of eye masks.. i have super dry eyes.. clogged oil ducts and tear ducts... heat therapy works great, but the hassle factor makes it really inconvenient.. this nice little USB powered heated mask help to extend the time that another heated mask with heft to actually push against your eyelids, way better... love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeping Aid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a fit of insomnia. It didn't make me sleep, but it helped. The lavender is sooo relaxing. The only thing I didn't like was how my eyes felt later. I guess this was made for people who have dry eyes, but if your eyes are fine, then this may upset them. It feels good while sleeping, but after a couple of days it just hurts during the day. I tried to put eater on the mask so that it was a steamer but not much changed. I still use the mask and lavender without the hest.
customer_reviews.author: reina609

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor suggested warm eye mask to relieve my dry eye symptoms during the recent eye checkup. I didn't buy the microwavable heated eye mask at the doctor's office. Instead, I searched and purchased Aroma Season USB Steam Eye Mask on Amazon. I am impressed with the quality of the product and absolutely love it. The material is soft, and feels very comfortable to put it on. It comes with a nice pouch and the heat temperature is adjustable. I have USB outlet next to my bed, thus, I enjoy using it before bed time.
customer_reviews.author: KQin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and love them. I work as an airline pilot and the dry atmosphere and long days are hell on my eyes. A short nap with these and my eyes feel great. I also bought a little battery for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J. Rae

customer_reviews.title: 4 star rating
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with the meibomian oil glands in my eyes and they get clogged all the time causing discomfort. I ordered this product to help with that. The mask itself works very well as far as warming the eyelids. But I find that a moist compress works better and I can't figure out how to use this with moisture. If anyone can advise me, I would appreciate it. Makes a great sleeping mask without heat on.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Blue stuff leaked out of the mask
customer_reviews.text: This product began leaking something blue all over my sheets. I think it was the lavender scented fabric inside. The cord was complete covered with blue, my pillowcases stained in the shape of the mask. Eventually the blue color has washed out of the sheets and I took the lavender insert out and still use the mask which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best discovery ever for sore eyes - I bought 6 immediately after the first try
customer_reviews.text: After my first pair, I immediately bought 6 others to give away for Xmas. These smell like lavender and the timer feature is a huge bonus over traditional hot towels. you could set the temp in 5 different intensity and 2 is already hot for me. The timer can be set in various settings within an hour. The mask is very comfortable to sleep in, even for ladies with lash extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Occa949

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC !
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say than FANTASTIC for a company that has the best service that I can think off. They not only took the trouble to answer my numerous mail on product information, but they (incredibly) sent to me an item that I was not able to find at no cost to me, I never had anything like that in all my purchasing years . Their product Aroma Season USB Steam Eye Mask is extremely well made, including materials and design, and it does the job that it was meant to do superbly. All in all, I wish they would have more than a five stars ratings, they would certainly get one from me. Marc G
customer_reviews.author: Marc G.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my microwaveable eye mask, for treatment of clogged meiobian glands. This one isn’t as warm as my other, and my eyes don’t become as blurry after use with this one (which I think means it’s not working as effectively as my microwave one). I like that it gives a constant warmth and that I can set it for a timed amount. I hope that it’ll prove to be successful in treating my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I have very painful dry eye
customer_reviews.text: I have very painful dry eye. I was using the masks you have to put in the microwave but the heat would only lasts for a few minutes. I love this I mask because it has a time limit setting and a heat setting. This'll be great for when I travel. I am lowering my 5 star rating to 2 stars because it stopped working after 4 months for the 3rd time. I emailed the company, they did not give me a reason why this happened. Sad, because this mask really helps my eyes when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: nyc

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Cord: Heater Lasted 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: The mask comes apart from the heating cord too easily, then immediately loses heat, so I taped mine together. It must be plugged in to get heat. That worked well. Mine lasted 6 months, before failing to heat up any more....which is also about as long as the lavender maintained its scent. The cord is also uncomfortable for side / tummy sleepers! I will be looking for a new product.
customer_reviews.author: JLK

customer_reviews.title: Soothing for Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I have extremely dry eyes. I use this at night. The heat option is wonderful and soothing! The fragrance is subtle, which is nice. My only suggestion would be to make the chord a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: LizJ

customer_reviews.title: follow-up
customer_reviews.text: As previously reviewed the mask feels luxurious, heats evenly with multiple options for time and heat levels. That said, since my last review the blue dye from the storage pouch has discolored and bonded with the wire and control unit in such a way as to make removal of the dye impossible even with scouring powder. I notified customer support of the problem and they offered to send me a replacement unit (that’s not the problem as the unit works fine!) but no mention of any intentions to re-design the pouch and/or sending me a different pouch. If I could I would have now given 5 stars for the unit and zero stars for the storage pouch.
customer_reviews.author: William Karnett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat up to the degree advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It was not warm enough to do anything. It did not heat up to anywhere near what the info indicated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I like that the highest heat setting is too hot so I know I won’t be frustrated wishing it would get hotter, it stays warm or hot with a 60 min timer so I can fall asleep with it on and it doesn’t block my sinuses in any way! Go...purchase and enjoy.—important side note...get this exact one, the others won’t thrill you as much ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Trader

customer_reviews.title: and I can tell you this is a fantastic product. I use this every night to release ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this over a month now, and I can tell you this is a fantastic product. I use this every night to release my stress. Unlike some other products need to heat up by microwave, this is much easier to operate. I am buying few more for my family members.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Electric aromatherapy sty buster
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but I must say I’m super glad I grabbed this. I had a stubborn sty on my eyelid which this novelty helped it to finally go away. I must say even without an eye issue this is certainly spa worthy self indulgent. That 50 minute timer is perfect & the USB power source didn’t add to my bedside footprint at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2shop

customer_reviews.title: Nice relaxing mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I don’t find it too warm at all unlike others. The only thing that can be annoying is pending how you’re sitting/laying in relation to the outlet, the cord will have to lay across you. But I’m happy with this I’ve been using it every night
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Wish it would heat up a bit more. I know it has different settings but even the high one is not warm enough. I know it’s not recommended but honestly, we have to take out the padding to feel the heat and even then... would like it to be hotter than that
customer_reviews.author: diana Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: After using the mask for 5 months it is now dead. There is apparently 12 months warranty on the mask but I do not know how to apply for an exchange, Tad update on 7/10/2020 I was contacted by April from Aroma Season with an offer to replace the mask. I received it, as promised, on July 7. It is an improved mask with a new controller (this is a part that malfunctioned in the previous mask). It is more functional than the old one. I would like to thank April for very reliable cooperation in replacing the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: SO RELAXING!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I love this thing. Smells delightful & is so relaxing after a long day. I bought it to help with dryness that I’ve been suffering from since having lasik. I can’t say I’ve noticed a huge difference production but its still a great product. Only downside is the cord can inconvient.
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyMarlyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, practical and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's got great presentation, great quality, and works exactly as needed. It does take about 1 minute to warm up, but it sure beats having to microwave eye covers. It also has a removable velvety soft cover and a removable lavender-smelling insert. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Yosh

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. My eye doc wants me to wear one nightly due to dry eye. The one he sold me cooled quickly and wasn't convenient. Love the lavender aroma, the timer and adjustable heat settings. Have yet to try the most heat. A must have in my book. Great for spa days and headaches too
customer_reviews.author: Maureen H

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has terrible dry eye. This is a significant aid in reducing this winter, dry air symptom.
customer_reviews.author: robcoscob

customer_reviews.title: Works so well! Both my partner and i find ...
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! Both my partner and i find it clears up any head tension. The smell is very natural. We are very sensitive to smells and the real lavender is subtle and soothing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kahle

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately The Cover Fell Apart When Washed!
customer_reviews.text: The heated mask performed its intended role well and I was looking forward to using it well into the future but when I went to clean the cover, as directed by the mask product instructions, the outside cover disintegrated when I applied water as directed. The silk side that touches the eyes cleaned up fine but the outside cover literally came apart and began to break into pieces! This is a very disappointing situation.
customer_reviews.author: Dr F Sisti

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing, not for dry eye therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but it doesn't get warm enough to make a big difference for dry eye symptoms. However it is soft, easy to use, comes in a nice case and is relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it is soft and the light smell is good
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and my doctor told me to do warm compresses a couple of time a day and this product makes it easy. I also had sinus congestion and the heat felt great. My mom loved it as well so I bought her one.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smelling and effective!
customer_reviews.text: Love my eye mask. It warms up nicely and can be attached to my laptop computer for power, making it convenient to use on my couch. The lavender smell and heat is very relaxing. Heat can be progressed from 1-5 and the time can be set from 10-60 min.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia V

customer_reviews.title: A good eye mask for not only eyes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate it and heat-up speed is quite fast. Recently I have been looking at digital screen for long. It could be completely and cozily release my tiredness. A small tip: wearing at the beginning of sleep could get you falling asleep fast and sound.
customer_reviews.author: daoan wu

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ocular Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. I use it every night - great for ocular rosacea. It appears slightly warmer towards where the cord comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: With No Timer it can be a problem
customer_reviews.text: If only it had a timer! It is wonderful to use and amazingly relaxing BUT I have fallen asleep twice wearing it. I purchased a different USab Eye Mask with a timer to use in its place.
customer_reviews.author: AviSaint

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work right out of the box. The light cones on for level 1 and 2 then the entire display goes dark. It also hasn’t warmed up an ounce even on 1 and 2 when the display is lighted and it Looks like it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Many

customer_reviews.title: Love my eye mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love my eye mask! The varied temperatures settings and the built-in timer are very helpful, and being able to simply plug in to my phone charger is super convenient. One thing that would make it easier to use is if it produced moist heat without having to spray water on the mask covering. All in all, it's a great product and meets all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would have given this a five but I sleep on ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this a five but I sleep on my right hand side and the wiring pushes into the side of my head. I had to get a thick powder puff to keep the wiring ftom hurting so I could sleep. Wish it was longet so the wiring was further back on the mask so it wouldn't go into the side of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and relaxing-highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask is wonderful and very comfortable. I tend to get Chalazions and this has really helped them soften and stop growing. It's also very relaxing and helps me get to sleep better - a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: BLBshopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sit right on my eyes. It should.
customer_reviews.text: It needs to come in contact with eyes better. Otherwise, it’s great. Many of these do not get mark enough to help. This one does.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Paw Luke

customer_reviews.title: Helps with styes
customer_reviews.text: I am prone to styes and severe dry eyes. My doctor recommended that I need to place a heated cloth over my eyes for 10 to 30 minutes twice a day plus some eye drops he recommended. However sometimes I just want to go straight to bed after a busy day. This thing makes that whole process soo much easier. I use it right before I fall asleep while I listen to my favorite podcast. And yes I have on occasions fallen asleep while I was still wearing it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Best heated eye mask
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and this eye mask really helps. I have tried other brands of heated eye masks and this one is the best of them. I had a mask which had to be microwaved but it was inconvenient plus it would get too hot for my eyes. I had also been using japanese disposable heated eye masks, but it was expensive to use those on a regular basis. I like how this eye mask can be charged via a usb cable, and how the cover can be washed. Plus the heat and time settings are great and it helps me to sleep well every night.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve redness
customer_reviews.text: Started using it right away. I have stage 3 dry eye and use medicated eye drops. Helped ease the redness in my eyes. Hopefully it will help with the MGD as well.
customer_reviews.author: Neila

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much that I'm buying it for all my friends. I have a glandular problem in my eyes and this mask is helping me a lot. It's also good when I have headaches and for relaxing my eyes after a computer work day. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: magdac

customer_reviews.title: Dried my eyes more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for eye dry relieve . The devise is nice, the heat is good but after 3 times of use, i woke upwith my eyes super dry. Both...
customer_reviews.author: Choco

customer_reviews.title: Helps you to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It helps me to fall asleep and I have also used it as an at-home-spa-treatment - I apply eye cream and eye gels then setting 4. Super.
customer_reviews.author: Zapper0

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I can have it right next to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I can have it right next to my bed and do not have to get up and microwave the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Its was a gift to my frd and he like it so much he is having some eye problem so its help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines and these masks help immensely. Love them. Smell good and the heat is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Fresca

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mask for over a year and would give it 10 Stars if I could. I have used it every day since I got it and it literally shows no signs of wear. It has worked well since the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: theReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. I am upset cause I loved it. Did not last one month. Cord pulled loose.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! LEAVES DYE STAINS ON FACE
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product at first, but after using it for about a week I noticed that my eyes would be darker after using it. I used it again and my eyes and area around my eyes were tinted dark purple/black. DO NOT BUY THIS--the dye from the mask WILL transfer onto your face when heated.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Worked Once
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one, of these, it was great while it worked but it stopped heating after a month. So I bought another one and it failed after a single use. I have no idea why this happened twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Anshutz

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient , small coverage area
customer_reviews.text: It only heats a thin strip in the middle along the heat pad. Won't cover your eye sorroundings like other microwave heat pads.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed O.

customer_reviews.title: 5 is really hot so I use 3.
customer_reviews.text: I have blepharitis and This help a lot I don’t have to do the warm press anymore or the sock with rice I put it on at night and fall sleep really relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Stress relieving and great for eyelid issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had redness in my eye that my optemolegist said was due to clogged pores under my eyelids. He said a heatmask might work. This is so comforting and is softly scented with lavender. I have been using this for two months and the scent is still there and it works great. I noticed a difference in the redness of my eyes after the first use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this mask is really calming and smells great. I do wish it would have a longer ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with an ongoing stye in my eye. While that hasn't healed, this mask is really calming and smells great. I do wish it would have a longer timer on it than 60 min but I understand the safety concerns as well.
customer_reviews.author: adbestler

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Have been using a heated eye mask for years and it’s crazy how much it’s helped my astigmatism. I love the lavender smell, it puts me right to sleep after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Yost

customer_reviews.title: Stressed dry red eyes
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice so far but this product is amazing. I suffer from stressed dry red eyes lately from going thru a divorce and this help immediately. My eyes finally have some relief
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night just before bed. Great. The only thing I wish was for more comfortable padding. Sorta feels a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Convenient & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Really helps with migraines. Cold doesn't work for me but heat does, this is so easy & convenient .
customer_reviews.author: Larla

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great...when it works. I’ve had it less then two weeks and the heat adjust button has stopped working. Whenever I try to click it it turns the whole thing off. This is only the third use. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Snation

customer_reviews.title: Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have dry eyes. this has helped so much. Like that it is lug in. You can control the temperature and time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Unit won't stay on. Slight movement of the power turn it off. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Bui

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dry eye sufferers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you suffer from dry eyes. It is comfortable enough that it puts me right to sleep and the heat is soothing but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Meyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few months, but now it won’t power on...not worth it do what I paid since it won’t work now
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Parks

customer_reviews.title: Stains!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the heat. The problem is, I placed the mask on my bed after using it and it stained my rather expensive linen bedding a blackish color that will not wash out. Also, it has created stains on the cord. This is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: s. ristuccia

customer_reviews.title: Fire
customer_reviews.text: Be careful the one I got caught on fire where you push the buttons
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great feel good product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. My dry eyes feel much better. I like the auto timer. It's a meditation in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Van Gerpen

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly smell the lavender but otherwise it’s pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works pretty well. The small is hardly noticeable and I have to put it on high to make it warm enough to do any good. But it feels great on and it comes with this nice little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: T13sport

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy them again if I lost mine.
customer_reviews.text: I really like there eye pads. I suffer from dry eye syndrome and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Frankel

customer_reviews.title: part missing
customer_reviews.text: The part that plugs into the wall was missing when received. I waited over a month for the part and then received the controller instead of the plug. Too bad because I know product if I could receive all parts would be good
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Schoenberg

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely amazing for upset eyes or a bad headache
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing for upset eyes or a bad headache. I love it! In fact I don't know what I would do without it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sue H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask is way better than I was expecting and definitely good value for the price point. I have blepharities and suffer from styes and this mask affords relief and comfort. I've also noticed an improvement in my ability to fall asleep when using the mask. Just purchased one as a gift for a friend I love it that much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Burnt Out in Six Months
customer_reviews.text: Only used once every few weeks. Then when I needed it most it was defunct.
customer_reviews.author: Philadelphia Belle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for calming anxiety and stress. Love the lavender smell and the warmth helps my migraines!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was using the microwave eye mask that I got from my eye doctor for dry eye. I ordered this, and love it. It is so nice just using my phone charger and it immediately heats up, very relaxing and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Great product design and easy to use. The eye mask warms up quickly comparing to tradition one that requires heating up by microwave. I also love the removable cover that is washable. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works great. Helps significantly with loosening clogged oil glands and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Helps significantly with loosening clogged oil glands and relieving itch eyes. Would be nice if it would come with a spay bottle to moisten, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Heather McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: warms fairly well, has a lavender smell to it. The USB plug is convenient, can plug it into most any phone charger, and carrying case isn't fancy but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Helps me sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I keep telling all of my friends and family that have a hard time sleeping. The second I put this on, I am asleep! It helps my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: shaye

customer_reviews.title: Meiboman Gland dysfunction savior
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask because I get chronic styes and chalazion due to meibovian gland dysfunction (oils in my eyelids don’t release and get stuck to cause styes). This mask is so convenient with timer. Use every night before bed. Heat setting 5 is just as hot as a microwaved mask. I am going to by two to alternate cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Maggiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Works well but I wish the cord was longer
customer_reviews.text: Works well compared to microwavable eye pads, but you have to keep it charged into a device via USB so I wish the cord were longer. The material touching your eye is similar to satin so it stains easily.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months using it I can say it’s really a great product. Different level of temperature+timer. My eyes were so relaxed afterwards. I used to get the disposable ones but this saves me a lot of money. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: hata

customer_reviews.title: Restful eyes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tired eyes and for those who suffer from swollen lids
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have an eye mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye mask so much, I am ordering another for travel. I have serious sleep problems and I noticed that I can fall asleep easily when using at night time. The light scent of lavender is most pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use my back up battery for my phone to power it. Works really well and is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one that broke..
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve bought that has broken within 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for chronic dry eye.
customer_reviews.text: Even my ophthalmologist was impressed by this product. It can provide consistent heat for up to an hour without burning you. I wear mine every night.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, relaxing, right amount of heat, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the purple and soft mask with lavender smell along with the easy usb plug. My eyes develop some tears after 30 min use. It's relaxing and light with an easily adjustable elastic band.
customer_reviews.author: djquiksilver

customer_reviews.title: life changer
customer_reviews.text: keeps my eye from swelling up when I have flare ups
customer_reviews.author: stevelgar

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye mask! The warmth helps me fall and stay asleep and when I wake I feel like I’ve gotten an adequate amount of rest. The smell that eliminates from the mask is very pleasant to me but I’m such an aromatherapy freak
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.stallw

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as my eye are sensitive and I have been getting bad styes lately. I am very happy with it so far and very appreciative of the auto-timer shut off in case I fall asleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Gets nice and warm not too hot
customer_reviews.text: Very relaxing to the eyes. Especially if you have dry eye syndrome. Gets nice and warm not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really helps me sleep. I also get to apply heat to my eyes with leaving bed.
customer_reviews.author: Merinda McCalpine

product_meta.title: Heated Eye Mask, USB Steam Warm Compress for Puffy Eyes, Warm Therapeutic Treatment for Dry Eye, Chalazion, Blepharitis, Stye (Black)
feature_bullets: The soothing warmth helps you go into deep sleep at home, take a rest for eyes at office, enjoy yourself on travel and have an eye spa in the hotel.
It's designed to have 3 classes heat temperature from 98.6 to 125.6℉ and 3 classes timing from 20 to 60 minutes. It will stop working automatically when you go into deep sleep.
Powered by PC, power bank, USB adapter. Packed with a lovely carry bag. Easy to take it everywhere you go.
Inspired by disposable hot steam eye mask, heated with carbon fiber heater, But more environment friendly, more convenient, more economical than disposable hot steam eye mask.
Aroma Season provides 12 months quality warranty. Feel free to contact us by email (You would find the service email on the Warranty Card). Aroma Season customer services will answer you in 24 hours.
